trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event of a <xref href="System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee geeft u de methode die verantwoordelijk is voor de **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** gebeurtenis van een <xref href="System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: De gemachtigde AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler is gedefinieerd voor de <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>gebeurtenis van de <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>klasse.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: U hebt toegang tot de <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>gebeurtenis van de <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>klasse door te geven van een subroutine met de naam **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** in het bestand Global.asax voor uw ASP.NET-toepassing.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest> event.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> constructs an <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>vormt een <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>object met de huidige <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>en doorgegeven aan de **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** gebeurtenis.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object supplied to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value.
trans-unit.target: U kunt de <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>eigenschap van de <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>object doorgegeven aan de **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** gebeurtenis om de anonieme id ingesteld op een aangepaste waarde.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a <xref:System.Guid> is used.
trans-unit.target: Als u niet een waarde op voor de <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>eigenschap tijdens de **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** gebeurtenis, een <xref:System.Guid>wordt gebruikt.</xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when anonymous identification is <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A> by setting the configuration element to `true`.
trans-unit.target: De **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** gebeurtenis wordt alleen geactiveerd wanneer anonieme identificatie is <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>door het configuratie-element in te stellen op `true`.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>
